channel.title: Hosting on a laptop, need help!
channel.description: Hey i have been recently trying to host on my laptop using windows 7. i've tried the easiest methods like hamachi and still it doesnt seem to let anyone else get on my server, any advice would be SUPER appreciated.. i have had this problem for about a month and a half.

item.title: Hosting on a laptop, need help!
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

ive re-downloaded hamachi several times and it seems to not like my internet, firewall, port, i just cant figure it out >.<

Read full topic
item.source: Hosting on a laptop, need help!
